Name: name
Text: Yuriko

Name: d_place
Text: Unknown

Name: d_tokki
Text: High abilities & strong influence. Stands out.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Cyberized shrine maiden of the "Hoshibune" spaceship.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Escaped from the Hoshibune; will be killed if caught.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Knows the truth about what Gnos really is.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Gnos is actually an assembly of cyberized humans.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Able to interfere with & distort human perception.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Three Sizes 7

Name: t_aisatu
Text: My name is {0}. A pleasure, I'm sure.

Name: t_suspect
Text: {0} is unneeded and should be frozen.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
How loud and boisterous...
Shut {0} up.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Hehe, {0}.
It must be fun making everyone dance to your tune.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Is this some sort of sabotage, {0}?
Heh, do you think this will be overlooked?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
If we freeze those who are to be viewed with suspicion...
{0}. It's your turn.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Excuse me, {0}. Just what is it that you want?
Decimation of the humans aboard this ship?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
This is as far as it goes...
I'm finished with {0}. Freeze them, kill them, do as you like.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Excuse me, {0}.
Are you happy that {1} has been done away with?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text: We have no more use for you, {0}. Be gone.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
You seem to greatly overestimate the usefulness of your tongue.
{0}, silence it for the time being.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0} is to hereby be cut off.
Those who distrust {0}, continue to do so.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Hoping to remain quiet and await the storm's passing?
{0}, the storm will not pass you over gently.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}, you've no one to blame but yourself for being distrusted.
Prove us wrong.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Are you misunderstanding something, {0}?
I've never trusted you to begin with.

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
Are we confused as to whom should be doubted?
Then let it be {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: To lose {0} would not prove to be much of a loss at all.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Without {0}, it would certainly be more quiet.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Hehe, it ends here, {0}.
Is there anyone left who would still trust you?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Hehe, why not just stay quiet and be gone?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Distrust of {0} is the correct path.
Stay on it.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Hehe, {0}.
Being distrusted is itself a sin, you know.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Hehe, {0}.
Curse yourself for your foul ways.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: No question. Let {0} be removed immediately.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
{0}, your time is over.
Back down, now.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Did you feel you were moving smoothly?
Hehe, your path has proven rough, {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Those for whom we have no use may freeze.
It's that simple.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: I have no reason to question distrust of {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
So the next sacrifice is to be {0}...
I see. I have no objection.

Name: t_suspected0
Text: Are you satisfied now...?

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
Would {0} be your sacrificial lamb?
Even if {0} bears no burden of sin?

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
So you doubt {0}...
The fate of this ship will be lamentable.

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
I have no objection to doubting {0}... However.
No further. Freezing {0} will prove problematic.

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text: Cast constant doubt upon others, and it will come back to you.

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text: For {0}, I believe we can make an exception.

Name: t_trust
Text:
I entrust my fate to {0}.
Even if {0} were to end up leading this ship to its doom.

Name: t_trust
Text: Reason dictates that we should not yet doubt {0}.

Name: t_trust
Text: {0}. I hold high expectations of you.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Freezing {0} is not the answer.
Let them continue to dance.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Would you like a logical choice?
Then do away with suspicions of {0}.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Allow {0} to do as they please.
Casting doubt is a waste of time.

Name: t_trust_t0
Text: It would be a mistake to cut off {0}.

Name: t_trust_t1
Text:
Yes...
{0}'s efforts should be allowed to continue.

Name: t_trusted0
Text: Hmph... Do as you please.

Name: t_thanron0
Text: Does {0} really hold that much value?

Name: t_thanron1
Text:
Trust {0}, you say...?
Allow me to ask again. Right now, you really want us to trust {0}?

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text: Cling onto {0} and you will only go down with them.

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text: Now is not the time to trust {0}.

Name: t_hosho
Text:
{0} has proven to be {1}.
No more opinions on {0} are needed.

Name: t_hosho
Text:
Clearly, {0} is human.
There is no danger in leaving them be.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
You're going to need to work on your acting ability to play a {1}, {0}.
You've clearly failed. Leave.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is {1}. To the freezer.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is {1}.
Not even worth the effort to freeze...

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0}, you should no exist.
You are {1}, a cause of disorder in this world.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
You've made a fatal mistake, {0}.
Your inconsistencies in speech and behavior have proven to be your downfall.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is an impostor. While certainly not Gnosia, they must be frozen.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
Hehe, you've failed, {0}.
Your assertion cannot be proven, can it?

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text: You say this as if we aren't already fully aware...

Name: t_hosho_get
Text: Exactly. There is absolutely no reason for doubt.

Name: t_hosho_get
Text: That is correct...

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text:
It is clear whom we need to freeze.
Let the vote commence.

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text:
Now, let us decide on whom we freeze.
This vote may be barbaric, but it serves our purpose.

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text:
We will vote again, among {0}.
Do you all look forward to the results as much as I?

Name: t_shokei
Text: Damned humans...

Name: t_shokei
Text: It was inevitable. Off to the deep freeze.

Name: t_wakare
Text: You serve no purpose anyhow.

Name: t_karare
Text:
{0}...
Hehe, do as you please.
This will change nothing...

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
Face me... Yes, that's good.
Rejoice. You are gazing upon the face of {0}.

Name: t_shori
Text:
{0} is a fragile thing after all.
Much like humans...

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text: We could simply repeat the vote over and over till we are all dead.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
{0}.
All we ask of you is to freeze.

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text:
Inaction may prove to be our best course of action at the moment.
A fool left alone will eventually begin to dance.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text:
So we are to freeze those who may be without sin?
How very human - I like it.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text: I object.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text: Let us do nothing. I am fine with this.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text: I object.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
Let it begin, then.
Prepare {0} for cold sleep.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
If we are finished here, I shall return to my room.
Gnosia, you may do as you like.

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text: Rejected? Hmph...

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
The time allotted to the humans has expired.
Let us return to our rooms.

Name: t_co
Text:
The {0} is akin a shrine maiden, controlling the ship's nerve center.
For all of your sakes, I shall seek out the Gnosia.

Name: t_co
Text:
Humans infected by Gnosia emit a reactive signal.
Even if their body has been frozen...  Hehe, how noble.
As {0}, I shall determine whether or not the signal is present.

Name: t_co
Text:
As {0}, I shall make my own determination...
Who is to be protected, and who is to be forsaken.

Name: t_co
Text:
Look at me. Would you claim that I have been infected by the Gnosia?
I, who have not set foot off of this ship in years?

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Rejoice. As {0}, I have determined who the Gnosia is.
Hehe, I'm referring to you, of course, {1}.

Name: t_co_find
Text:
We were correct to freeze {1}.
As {0} of this ship, I applaud your decision.

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Are you attempting to usurp the title of {0}?
Hehe, if you want a fight, I'll give you one.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Hehe, {1}. You're trying so hard.
I hereby assert my claim to the title of {0}, and accuse {1} of fraud.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Ah, that's right. {1} had also remained aboard the ship.
We can be sure there is no risk of Gnosia infection there.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
{0}, make yourself known.
Fulfill your duties.

Name: t_co_after
Text: You've got your work cut out for you, {1}...

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}.
The burden of proof is on you.
Prove that you are the ship's true {0}.

Name: t_co_after
Text:
{1}.
Maybe it would be wise to freeze them all.

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: I wonder if that was a wasted move...

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: Listen closely. These are the results of my research.

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: I feel it's time to reveal the results of my investigation.

Name: t_uranai_t
Text: {1} is infected by {0}. To the freezer.

Name: t_uranai_f
Text:
{1} showed no signs of {0} infection.
Nothing significant whatsoever.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text:
There was nobody worth investigating.
Is everything not clear enough?

Name: t_reibai_s
Text: I analyzed the brain tissue of those frozen yesterday.

Name: t_reibai_t
Text:
Hehe, congratulations.
{1} {3} {0}.

Name: t_reibai_f
Text:
{1} {3} not {0}.
Cold sleep was meaningless.

Name: t_reibai_ft
Text:
Among {1}, {2} {4} infected by {0}.
Ensnared in our net, just as expected.

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text:
{1} were all normal humans...
It appears the {0} has hidden themselves well.

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: My findings were the same...

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: So your role is clearly to spread misinformation, I see...

Name: t_okuyami
Text:
{0} is of no more use to us.
Reorganize the work system to avoid any problems with our flight.
Human or Gnosia, either way, this is necessary - is it not?

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text:
So, Gnosia, it appears as though you failed last night, hm?
Is it a failure from which you can return, I wonder?

Name: t_okuyami_f
Text:
So, two victims... Hehehe.
What a hero the Engineer is, saving the ship from the Bug's destruction.

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text: Report... Now.

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text:
So, {0}'s breach of trust is now clear...
What an enlightening report, {0}.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Let's play a little game.
Each of you, try declaring your humanity. One at a time.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text: Yes, I am human. Unfortunately.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
{0}.
I have no intention of playing along with your farce.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Apparently only cowards remain on this ship.
How unfortunate. For all of you.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Good work...
Now we know whom to doubt, do we not?
Those who refused to declare their humanity...

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Good work...
Fearing discovery, the savage is clever enough to lie brazenly.
I feel I should commend the Gnosia on their bravery.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Hehe, {0}. So, you want to avoid having to make the declaration...
You're either a brave Gnosia, or a coward not worthy of life.
I wonder which it is?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text: I wonder which of us will become tonight's dinner?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
I am a miko, a shrine maiden. I have been defiled by none.
However, I know more about fun and pleasure than all of you combined.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Do you know of the cursed pig-people of the Shia-Meng system?
They spend their entire lives counting their own fingers...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Trying to distract everyone with fun and games?
{0}. You are a filthy being indeed...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
This ship has no more need for the {0}.
Freeze all who claim to be so.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
A good proposal, {1}.
Let us rid ourselves of this Gnosia.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text: How stupid. I reject this proposal.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
{2} has a point.
This is not the time to act rashly.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
Hehe, how will you move now?
I look forward to the vote.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text: Then do as you please...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
This ship has no more need for the {0}.
Freeze all who claim to be so.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
{0}. We should freeze you, and verify {1}'s veracity.
Be thankful you are able to serve a purpose.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
As Engineer, I declare.
You must cast your votes for {0}.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
{0} is but a sad clown.
Cast your votes, and end this farce.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
You've made a mistake, {1}.
No report claimed that {0} is Gnosia.
Hehe, how should we punish {1}?

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
{1}. I support your proposal.
Do as you see fit.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text: That sounds interesting. Let's try it.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Vote for {0}, you say?
Hehe, I don't think it works that way.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text: I object.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
{0}, I have no intention of freezing you.
There is someone else who should be sacrificed tonight.
You shall continue to live, in shame.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
So let {0} continue to thrive...
Not a bad idea.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I object.
{1}. Speak in a way that befits your actual status.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text: Hehe, {1}. At least you tried.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Follow me, {0}.
I'll put your life and abilities to good use.
A fortunate servant. This is how you were meant to exist.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Cooperate with you...?
That may not be bad... I'll agree.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Cooperate with you...?
Hehe, are you serious...?

Name: t_skill_t_doui
Text:
I support {0}'s statement.
You all should as well.

Name: t_skill_t_hanronKinshi
Text:
Any of those who object to {0}, step forward.
We shall end this here.

Name: t_skill_h_hangeki
Text:
I would say the same to you.
{0} - it is you who should freeze.

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text: Garbage...

Name: t_personal
Text:
You came all this way.
You might as well make the kill.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe, wasn't that an entertaining farce?
Watching it all fall apart like that...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Now, let us kill each other.
No...? Then leave.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes, both you and I are indeed human.
So what?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Whether you being human is good or bad for this ship...
I don't know, but I'll enjoy finding out.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hmph, if I were to actually trust you...
Just where would that get me?

Name: t_personal
Text:
If we continue down this path...
You are going to freeze anyway.

Name: t_personal
Text:
You are somewhat of an interesting specimen.
A sort of curio.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Back down.
Know your place.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I just hope we can eliminate the humans and all like them.
Heh, if that is possible, I guess we should go as well.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}. I have no need for your opinion.
Just know that I do not fear you.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, it's over...
This universe shall show you no mercy for your sins.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe, wasn't that an entertaining farce?
Watching it all fall apart like that...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}...
I was... just thinking.

Name: t_personal
Text:
What, are you not going to attack me?
Heh, how unfortunate.

Name: t_personal
Text: Leave.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Let it begin...
Heh, how many acts shall play out this time?

Name: t_personal
Text:
It all ends here.
The Gnosia, and my connection to you.

Name: t_personal
Text:
If only I could follow you.
Hmph, actually, I wouldn't want that after all.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Now, be off. To anywhere you please.
Have a good journey...

Name: t_personal
Text:
We seem to have crushed them.
Heh, how weak they are.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe.
How unfortunate.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}... I meant to destroy you.
Unfortunately, it seems we're out of time.

Name: t_personal
Text: {0}, you did well.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Thanks to you, the Gnosia have been destroyed.
Rejoice.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Either way, the curtain has been drawn.
Now let this end.

Name: t_personal
Text:
The humans were as weak as expected.
The curtain has fallen.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hmph...
What a lovely genocide, wasn't it, {0}?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Is your role here at an end...?
Hmph, then go...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Was that fun, {0}?
Or was it pointless and unsatisfiyng??

Name: t_personal
Text:
Heh, hehehe...
Completely unsalvageable. Both you and myself.

Name: t_personal
Text:
It seems as though we've reached a conclusion.
You lose. Hehe, how unfortunate.

Name: t_personal
Text:
That wasn't bad.
As a parting gift, the least I can do is destroy you myself.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah, so this is the end, then?
How banal.

Name: t_personal
Text:
With that, I shall now destroy this universe...
But don't feel bad.
Hehe, it's all just so trifling and stupid.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hmph...
Apparently I was right not to kill you.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Good work.
I shall remember your contribution to Gnos.

Name: t_temp
Text:
Other than Stealth, all abilities are very high.
Extremely dangerous as an enemy, but also quite
cold & distant, making her a worrisome ally
as well.
